tgt_original: 七者於平林聚落，現從天下；

src_original: yāvanna mātā-pitarau satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitau bhavataḥ |
tgt_original: 八者於父母所令見真諦；

src_original: yāvadanavatapte mahāsarasi pūrvikā karmaplotiḥ śrāvakasaṅghena sārdhaṃ na vyākṛtā bhavatīti |
tgt_original: 九者於無熱池中，共諸苾芻，說業報因緣。

src_original: atha bhagavatā manasi kṛtvā śrāvakasaṃghena sārdhaṃ vyākṛtā bhavatīti |
tgt_original: 由此義故，世尊共諸苾芻，於無熱池中說昔本業報事。 告諸苾芻等：

src_original: bhagavān pūrvikāṃ karmaplotim anavatapte vyākartukāmo bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma |
tgt_original: 「可往無熱池邊，各說自本業事。

src_original: śrutvā taduktaṃ vacanaṃ maharṣerājñāṃ gṛhītvā sugatasya śiṣyāḥ |
tgt_original: 」時諸苾芻聞佛教勅，咸皆依命。

src_original: ṛddhyā tataste yayuragrapudgalā haṃsādhipaṃ vyomni yathaiva haṃsāḥ ||  yathaivānyahaṃsagaṇaparivṛtastathaiva buddho bhagavān śākyamuniḥ |  visphuradvicitramaricijāla ekonaiḥ pañcabhirarhaccataiḥ sārdhaṃ lohitapakṣaiḥ pakṣibhiḥ parivṛto garutmān iva vihāyasā jetavanād vihāran niragāt  ekonapañcaśatavītarāgeṇa sārdhaṃ gatavān |  atha bhagavān mahāśrāvakasaṃghena saha śrāvastyām antarhitaḥ himavaduttarasthagandhamādanaparvatasyottareṇa mahākīṭaparvatasyāgro'navatante mahāsarasi pratyasthāt |
tgt_original: 佛共四百九十九苾芻眾，於室羅伐城沒，無熱池邊出，往詣野猛藥叉遊行之處，其處花果甚可悅意。

src_original: tad anavataptaṃ mahāsaraḥ |  tacca ekaikapārśvena catuścatvāriṃśad yojanāni |  adhaścatvāriṃśad yojanāni |  yaṃ vyāḍayakṣācaritam manoramaṃ vicitrapuṣpaistarubhiḥ suśobhitam |  ito yato jalavahasāgaraṅgamā nadyaścatasraḥ prasṛtāścaturdiśam ||
tgt_original: 一名弶伽河、二名新度河、三名縛叉河、四名呬多河。

src_original: gaṅgā ca sindhuśca nadaśca vakṣuḥ śītā ca yānnaiva taranti martyāḥ |  anyatra yo (!) ṛddhibalasya lābhī hanteha gacchāmi saro mahodadhim ||
tgt_original: 其處嶮峻，非得通人而不能往。

src_original: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikaṃ cittamutpādayanti tasmin samaye'ntaśaḥ kunta-pipīlikā api prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittam ājānanti |
tgt_original: 爾時世尊起世俗心，作此心時，乃至蟲蟻皆知佛意。

src_original: tato nandopanandau nāgarājau saṃlakṣayato'smin sarasi sāśrāvakasaṃgho bhagavān pūrvikāṃ karmaplotiṃ vyākartukāma iti buddhādhiṣṭhānena viditvā tābhyām mahāsaraso madhye śakaṭacakrapramāṇam sahasradalaṃ vilasanmaṇinālakaṃ suhīrakakesaraṃ jvalatsarojarājakarṇikam akekapaṅkajaparivṛtam bhagavadāsanārthaṃ sauvarṇasaroruhaṃ vinirmitaṃ tatastasyāṃ karṇikāyām bhagavān niṣasāda bhikṣavo'pi bhagavato'bhimukham anyāsu kamalakarṇikāsu niṣaṇṇāḥ |
tgt_original: 難陀、鄔波難陀龍王知如來意，云何世尊起世間心？ 見佛欲於無熱池中，共諸苾芻各說往昔因業。 即於池中，化出大蓮花，其花千葉，猶如車輪，色如天金，寶莖花蘂金剛所作，無量千花周匝圍遶。 爾時世尊坐此花上，及諸苾芻各坐一蓮花。
